SEO.title: Industry Info, News & Tips
SEO.description: Check our blog for the latest updates and news from the world of blockchain, AI, VR, IoT, software and app development.

data.title: What Is Virtual Real Estate in the Metaverse and Why Is It so Popular?
data.baseline: The old saying “my home is my castle” has taken on an extra layer of meaning as numerous enthusiasts have started to both create metaverse real estate and invest in it. So is it something that you should also care about?

data.title: How Blockchain Revolutionized the Finance and Banking Industry
data.baseline: Since its inception, blockchain continues to bring innovative concepts to the domain of finance. Thanks to its decentralized nature, blockchain remodels traditional financial operations and thereby creates more advanced and effective solutions.

preview320.title: why-invest-in-nfts-main-1600
preview320.alt: Two people making money with NFTs

data.title: Is It a Good Idea to Invest in NFTs?
data.baseline: NFTs have become a household name and seem to have penetrated even the most conservative industries. Crucially, many view NFTs as a marvelous investment opportunity capable of bringing substantial revenue to their holders. But how true is that?

data.title: When You Need Blockchain For Your Project and When It Is Not the Best Option
data.baseline: Financial platforms, sports and health apps, transportation solutions, and even voting systems — blockchain now serves as a solid basis for them all. But is blockchain always the ideal solution, or are there exceptions? Let’s examine the tech inside out.

data.title: Everything You Need to Know About Web 3.0 and Its Impact on Your Business
data.baseline: From digital tokens and NFTs  to the metaverse, advances in web development never cease to surprise us. And here comes another buzzword — Web 3.0. What actually stands behind Web 3.0 and what changes might it bring to your business?

preview.title: how-to-avoid-mistakes-in-blockchain-projects-main-1600
preview.alt: A person thinking about how to start a blockchain business

preview768.title: how-to-avoid-mistakes-in-blockchain-projects-main-1600
preview768.alt: A person thinking about how to start a blockchain business

preview500.alt: A person thinking about how to start a blockchain business

preview320.title: how-to-avoid-mistakes-in-blockchain-projects-main-1600
preview320.alt: A person thinking about how to start a blockchain business

data.title: Why Do Some Blockchain Projects Fail?
data.baseline: With blockchain being touted as the next big thing, a multitude of businesses are rushing to embrace the technology. However, experience has shown that not all blockchain projects make it to the top — but why?

data.title: Ethereum 2.0 vs Polkadot: Two Promising Platforms to Solve the Scalability Issue
data.baseline: The Ethereum 2.0 upgrade promises to tackle blockchain’s most challenging problems. But there’s also Polkadot — a platform with even more ambitious goals. Which of the pair is most likely to grab the attention of the DeFi world?

data.title: How Are NFTs Reforming the DeFi Sector?
data.baseline: Since its appearance blockchain has gradually been changing the financial world. Now we’re witnessing two blockchain-based concepts – NFT and DeFi – merging together to transform the way we manage finances.
